          <title>
            <string language="en">Reactions of metals with acid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktionen der Metalle mit Säure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réactions des métaux avec de l'acide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reações dos metais com ácido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazioni dei metalli con acido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντιδράσεις των μετάλλων με το οξύ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacciones de metales con el ácido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows three set-ups for the reaction of zinc, copper and calcium with a dilute solution of hydrochloric acid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dilute hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal reactivity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">zinc</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt drei Installationen für 
die Reaktion des Zinks, des Kupfers und des Kalziums mit einer 
verdünnten Lösung der Salzsäure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre trois installations 
pour la réaction du zinc, du cuivre et du calcium avec une solution 
diluée d'acide chlorhydrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra três instalações para
a reação do zinco, do cobre e do cálcio com uma solução diluída 
do ácido hydrochloric.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra tre messe a punto per
la reazione di zinco, di rame e del calcio con una soluzione diluita 
di acido cloridrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τρεις οργανώσεις για την 
αντίδραση του ψευδάργυρου, του χαλκού και του ασβεστίου με μια 
αραιή λύση του υδροχλωρικού οξέος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra tres disposiciones para
la reacción del cinc, del cobre y del calcio con una solución 
diluida del ácido hidroclórico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kupfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">verdünnte Salzsäure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metallreaktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zink</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cuivre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">acide chlorhydrique dilué</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réactivité en métal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">zinc</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
